statements: UPDATE auditing_transactions SET compliance_status = false WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE auditing_transactions SET reviewer_name = 'John Doe', amount = 2500.00 WHERE id = 1002;
UPDATE auditing_transactions SET amount = 500.75, description = 'Expense for office supplies' WHERE id = 123
UPDATE auditing_transactions SET compliance_status = TRUE, reviewer_name = 'John Doe', transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 456
UPDATE auditing_transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE anti_corruption_laws SET law_name = 'Law XYZ', law_description = 'This law is important' WHERE law_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE anti_corruption_laws SET law_description = 'Updated Law Description', law_name = 'Updated Law Name' WHERE law_id = '98765432-abcdef-1234-5678-fedcba876543';
UPDATE audit_logs SET action = 'Login Successful' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 500.00, receiver = 'John Doe' WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE audit_logs SET action = 'Updated' WHERE log_id = 1001;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1500.45, receiver = 'Company XYZ' WHERE transaction_id = 2002;
UPDATE auditing_transactions SET amount = 1500.00, compliance_status = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE employee_records SET department = 'IT', hire_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE employee_id = 2002;
UPDATE auditing_transactions SET amount = amount + 1000, transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase'
UPDATE employee_records SET department = 'HR', hire_date = '2022-02-01' WHERE employee_id = 101

UPDATE transaction_audit_log SET audit_result = 'Approved', auditor_name = 'John Doe', audit_date = '2022-10-15 09:00:00' WHERE log_id = 201;
